amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities And Villages; Laws Applicable To More Than One And Less Than All Classes
amendatorysection.catchline: Planning commission; funds, equipment and accommodations; limit upon expenditures.
amendatorysection.para: The council may provide the funds, equipment and accommodations necessary for the work of the commission, but the expenditures of the commission, exclusive of gifts, shall be within the amounts appropriated for that purpose by the council; and no expenditures nor agreements for expenditures shall be valid in excess of such amounts.
